name: Depawture
description:
Hello! 

We are three Belgian IT students that developed this game in 48 hours for the Team Panoptes Game Jam II.

The Jam lasted 72 hours but we decided after 24 hours to move from our original "3D horror-story" idea to a cute 2D platformer.

We hope you'll have lots of fun playing this tiny platformer!

PS: The game requires you to play with a friend for now. 

Code entirely developed by us!

Cat asset made with <3 by seethingswarm
